text: A smoky haze dims the blazing sun.  Skyscrapers sit like watchtowers over the city, where East meets West for five a half million people a day.

THE AMERICAN EMBASSY - U.S. and Chinese flags side by sid HU LI, dark glasses, EXITS and slowly moves toward a STRE VENDOR across the street. She pays for an order of pork bao; as she takes her first bite we see:

TWO OFFICES ON THE SIXTH FLOOR BLOWN OUT - a huge firebal erupting over one side of the embassy. People panic and run.  Hu Li doesn't even flinch.  She ta a bite of her pork bao as she casually turns to the stunn street vendor.
(Chinese, subtitled)
Someone better call the police.

The passenger window rolls down and we see Carter, stylin a Chinese-cut suit.  He's holding a Chinese-English dictionary, leaning out the window - giving his best "do look to two girls in a convertible.
(int Chinese)
Deng wa lu yun cai-shen wu. The HORRIFIED GIRLS speed off, and Carter turns to Lee, w is driving and singing to his radio.
(singing)
...wish they all could be California... wish they all could be California girls... Carter ejects the BEACH BOYS CD from the stereo and TOSSE out of the SUNROOF.
I warned you about playing that shit when I'm in the car.
That was my CD.  Don't you ever touch a Chinese man's CD.
Did you see the way those girls drove off?  I did you a favor.
Those girls drove off because of you.
All I did was invite them for a drink.
You invited them to get naked and sacrifice a small goat.
(checking Chinese-English dictionary)
I said that?  Which word was "goat?" Lee picks up his CD case.
You owe me a copy of the Beach Boys Greatest Hits, Volume Two.
Don't be giving me attitude, Lee.  I've been here three days and we haven't done shit.  We haven't been to a club, haven't even talked to a girl.  I'm on vacation, and I want some mu-shu.
Mu-shu?  You're hungry?
Not Mu-shu.  Mu-shu.  I want to see some women.  Now stop playing dumb and show me the shu! Carter flips through the dictionary.  A CALL COMES in ove LEE'S CELL PHONE.
The following conversation is in Chinese, English subtitl
Lee, there was a bombing at the American Embassy.  Two American translators were killed.
Any leads?
(beat)
We think it's Ricky Tan.  If you don't want to take the case, I'll understand.
It's my responsibility. Lee hangs up the cell phone.
What was that?  Did you just pick up a case?  Did we just take another damn case on my vacation? Lee smiles at Carter.
Of course not.  My Superindendent invited us to a club tonight.  Big party.
Don't be messing with me, Lee.  I will kick your ass.  I'll hit you so hard you'll end up in the Ming Dynasty.
Carter, would I lie to you? EXT. RAVEN CLUB - NIGHT

Carter follows Lee out of the car, the two men making the way to the door of the Raven Club.  Carter is combing his hair, getting himself ready for a night on the town, stop when he spots two hot WOMEN walking into the club.
That's what I'm talking about.  A real Hong Kong night club.  You want an Altoid?
No.
You better take one.  Your breath has been a little funky all day.  Let me look at you. Carter looks at Lee.  Fixes his collar.
Just relax and don't worry about a thing.  I'll hook you up in there.  You got condoms?
No.
Take this.  It's a Magnum.  You can fold it in half. Carter dances through the door, Lee follows.

A dark, upscale club that is packed with GANGSTERS, BEAUT GIRLS and CIVILIANS.  Lee and Carter walk in.  Lee is try to keep a low profile as Carter stares up at the stage, w a man sings Karaoke -- the most painful rendition of Mich Jackson's "DON'T STOP 'TILL YOU GET ENOUGH."
I'll meet you at the bar in ten minutes.  They don't like tourists in here, so try to blend in.
Blend in?  I'm two feet taller than everyone here.  Where you going?
Bathroom. Lee walks off, trying not to be seen as Carter steps up t the bar, takes a seat next to TWO CHINESE THUGS.
How you boys doing tonight? The thugs ignore Carter as he motions to the stage, where OLD MAN continues to sing.
That is the worst singing I've ever heard.  That sounds like something you'd hear in prison after lights out. The thugs continue to ignore Carter.
Lee makes his way down a hallway -- looks through an open door - sees a private room.  Several TRIADS are using hi- MACHINES to count stacks of AMERICAN HUNDRED DOLLAR BILLS
Get closer to my body now.  And just love me, till you don't know how... Lee steps back into shadow -- does a double take as he realizes he's hearing Carter belting out "DON'T STOP 'TIL

A room full of Chinese sitting with their mouths open, watching Carter on the Karaoke stage doing a dead-on Mich Jackson, singing his heart out.  Dancing and making eyes few of the smitten women who are watching him.
(whispering from side of stage)
Carter, get off that stage!
Are you kidding, they love me.  I'm a star, Lee.  A god to these people! Carter resumes singing, really getting down.  Moonwalking the EDGE of the STATE where Lee PULLS HIM OFF.
This is a gangster bar, we're here undercover.
I knew you were lying.
I'm sorry.
Damn it, why are you ruining my night?  I'm just starting to have fun. (beat)
Well fine then, go ahead, pull your badge and do your thing.
No, we're here for information, to find out where a man named Ricky Tan is.  We must tread softly and keep our ears open.
Tread softly?  Who taught you how to roost a bar?
Carter, you don't understand.  These men are Fu-Cang-Long Triads.  Part of the most deadly gang in China.

Man, are you crazy?  You think that scares me?  I'm from  L.A.  We invented gangs.  We were having gang wars before anybody even thought about it.  We get royalties from other gangs.  Now gimme your badge and gun and I'll show you how it's done.
No.  You are a civilian.  In China, I am Michael Jackson, and you are Toto.

You mean Tito.  We had  Toto for dinner last night. Before Lee can react, Carter has lifted Lee's badge and g Carter bounds back on stage, pulls the plug on the music fires three SHOTS into the ceiling, silencing the bar.
(Chinese)
Deng wa lu yun, shen wu wattu masu wang lui. Nobody moves.  Strange looks from the crowd.  Carter turn Lee.
(whispering)
What'd I say?
You just said you're their worst nightmare - and to line their mothers up for a milking.
Shit.  C'mon, get up here and help me out. Reluctantly, Lee gets on stage.  More looks from the Chin as Carter speaks, Lee translating.
Okay, all the Triads and ugly women go to that side, all fine ass women on this side. Nobody moves.  Carter fires two more shots in the ceiling
Let's try this again.  Who here knows Ricky Tan, raise your hand. Nobody moves.
Who here is named Lee?  Raise your hand. Nobody moves.
Now I know you're lying.   The crowd still hasn't moved.  Except in the back, where spots several GANGSTERS leaving.  As Lee runs off stage -
(as they run out)
I come back and catch y'all singing Michael Jackson and you're all going to jail.
Lee and Carter run into the street, just in time to see H and several gangsters round a corner.
Stop!  LAPD! Lee takes off and chases them on foot.

The far end of the street is BLOCKED BY MARKET STALLS.  T GANGSTERS look around frantically.  An apartment building under CONSTRUCTION, massive BAMBOO SCAFFOLDING top to bot Their only way out is UP. Lee and Carter dash around the corner to see the gangster SWARMING UP THE SCAFFOLDING.  Lee wastes no time going af them.  With a running start, he JAMS A FOOT on the wall a VAULTS to the BOTTOM RUNG, GRABS HOLD AND SWINGS UP.

Hang on, Lee.  I'm coming. Carter jumps to grab hold of the scaffolding.  NOT EVEN CLOSE.  He backs up -- he's gonna take a running start! ABOVE - LEE REACHES 4 GANGSTERS.  They all tear off the LENGTHS OF BAMBOO and square off.  The clatter of wood against wood as they beat at each other.  Wrestling over pole, Lee FLINGS TWO of the GANGSTERS over the edge. BELOW, Carter has hold of the bottom rung, STRAINING MIGH to pull himself up.  Just as he gets his chin above the bar... snap!  It BREAKS and he drops.  Then... WHAM!  WHAM!  The two gangsters CRASH LAND ON EITHER side CARTER.  HE takes one look at their pain.

Forget this... He dashes into the stairwell.  ABOVE, the last two GANGST come at Lee.  He stomps down, levering up floor boards, w SEE-SAWS them off-balance.  With the advantage, he BATTER them with his bamboo pole and knocks them off.  He climbs after the GANGSTER LEADER. ON HU LI and the GANGSTERS Coming over the crest of the hill, seeing Carter climbing the hill.
Lee pulls himself up onto the roof, takes a few steps whe WHAM!  He is clocked by a 16-foot BAMBOO POLE.  Lee TOPPL OVER THE EDGE!  We see his adversary for the first time.
As she steps to the edge... BOOM!  The STAIRWELL DOOR FLI OPEN and CARTER EMERGES.  Gun low and ready.  Hu Li is go
(out of breath)

Freeze!  Nobody move! Carter goes to the edge and sees Lee hanging on a pole be Carter is blind-sided by Hu Li. She takes one sultry step towards him, then twists her he and WINDMILLS a HARD KICK that sends Carter FLYING OFF TH
He falls along the side of the building.  He manages to g the end of a BAMBOO POLE that juts out from the scaffoldi

head_text.subj: LEE IS RIGHT THERE NEXT TO HIM

text: They're hanging side-by-side, holding on for their lives. Li looks down at them.  She has no weapon to finish them She turns and runs, disappearing in the night.
holding on with all their strength.  The bamboo is starti to bend.
All I wanted was a little mu-shu.
Try to land on your feet. Carter looks down at a rancid dumpster below them.
I can't believe I flew ten-thousand miles for this shit. The POLE BREAKS
Carter and Lee drive through Hong Kong, the two men ridin silence, bruised and covered in garbage.
You lied to me.
I'm sorry.
You're sorry.  I got somebody's old chopsticks stuck in my ass, so don't tell me you're sorry.  Just take me home.
No time.  There was an explosion at the American Embassy today -- two American translators were killed. Carter takes this in.  Can't believe his own bad luck.
So that Ricky Tan, he's the one who blew up the Embassy?
Lee and Carter walk into a massive COURTYARD, where thirt year olds are going through their warm up routines.   MASTER FU, 60's, wears a BLACK ROBE as he teaches his kid
I'm telling you right now, I'm tired of this shit.  There's two billion Chinese - let one of them be your partner.
This won't take long.  Master Fu barks out a barrage of SHAOLIN FIGHTING STANCES
Dragon kick! Like well-trained army, the students YELL AND KICK HARD.
Lotus block! The students YELL and form an "X" with their arms.  Maste notices Carter and Lee watching from the back.
Twisting Tiger! No response.  The students exchange baffled looks.
(staring straight at Lee)
Twisting Tiger! Lee may be a big rusty, but he puts on a shit-kicking mov that leaves the students blown away.  Lee smiles, basking the glow... ...until he sees Master Fu's disappointment.
Didn't I teach you to always arch your back?
(bowing, humbled)
Yes, Master. While Lee follows Master Fu, Carter stands in front of th YEAR OLDS, who sit motionless around a fighting circle.  Carter starts stretching his legs, warming up.

I was watching you kids.  My name is Carter, LAPD, and I'm a third degree black belt.  At least that's what I tell the girls at the Holiday Health Spa where I work out. Carter throws a series of QUICK PUNCHES, but the kids hav reaction.
Let me give you kids some tips.  The key to Kung Fu is the follow through.  Why don't you stand up. THE KIDS DON'T MOVE, no reaction.  Carter continues to th punches.

Go ahead, kick me, hit me.  I'll show you how to block.  Come on, stand up, give me your best shot -- try to kick right to my head. The kids still don't move.  Carter, working up a sweat fr shadow fighting, takes off his JACKET, DRAPING IT over th HOLY BUDDHA behind him -- a mistake.  He swings back arou to face the kids and NEVER SEES THE KICK that sends him flying back onto the mat.  He looks around and sees ALL o the kids STANDING, in FIGHTING POSITION.
That's pretty good.  Which one of you kids did that?
Lee and Master Fu walking.
I need your help, Master.  I'm seeking a man who used to train with you.  He's become a killer - the worst kind of animal.
Animals kill only from hunger or fear.  The man you seek is lower than a serpent.   (faces Lee)

...he kills for money. In the b.g., we see the kids leaping acrobatically over Carter from all sides.  Carter, frustrated, tries to grab kids out of the air as they fly by, but they elude him. disappear O.S. Lee and Master Fu walk another moment, Master Fu lost in thought.
He was the best I ever trained, you know.
Ricky Tan?
No.  Your father. (Lee reacts)
Your father and Ricky Tan were my favorite students... and for such awful things to happen as they did -- Lee cuts off Master Fu's reminisces -- he's obviously uncomfortable.
How do I find Ricky Tan? AGAIN IN THE B.G., Carter and the flying kids go zipping in the other direction, disappear O.S. Master Fu pats the SOIL around a struggling plant.
A seeding spends its entire life reaching towards Heaven.
I know, Master, but...
The answers you seek can be found in Heaven on Earth.
Heaven on Earth?  Master, I don't understand. (working it)
A temple, where Heaven is on Earth?  A mountain, where Earth reaches for the --
It's a massage parlor downtown.  "Heaven on Earth."  You will find your answers there. Lee bows to Master Fu, slowly turns to walk back down the pathway.
Wait!  Put a c-note in the jar. Lee puts a few bills in the jar, heads down a pathway.  Master Fu walks over and takes the cash.
Cheap bastard...

Lee emerges from the path, stops when he sees Carter -- t students headlocked under each arm, another two scissor locked between his legs, holding another two down with hi hands, and sitting on the last one.
And that's how you use the LAPD choke hold.  Now start practicing and don't make me come back here!
Carter...you ready to have some fun!?
A neon light hangs above the upscale massage parlor.
Just follow my lead and act like a tourist.
I am a tourist.
Lee and Carter walk into an upscale MASSAGE PARLOR and st in a lobby.  SOFT MUSIC is playing.
Good afternoon, gentlemen. Lee bows, followed by Carter.
(in Chinese)
Hello.
How you doin'?
My friend is on vacation, from America.  I want to show him a good time.
Oh, you American?
That's right.
You bring American money?
(holding up a Platinum AmEx)
Never leave home without it. (to Lee)
Lee, this one's on me.  You save your money. The Hostess takes Carter by the arm, walks over to a HIDD SLIDING DOOR - slides it open to reveal TWENTY BEAUTIFUL WOMEN.  Carter truly is in Heaven.
You get massage from Chinese girl before?
No.  It's my first time.
You pick any girl for you and your friend. Carter looks like a kid in a candy store.
Any girl?  Okay.  Let's start with that one.
Oh yes, she's very nice.
She is nice.  But I am very tense.  I'm gonna need a lot of massages.  I'll take that one, too.  How you doin', baby?  And...that one in pink.  She can do my feet. Lee elbows Carter.
What are you doing?
She said I could pick any girl I want.
Well, hurry up.
Hey!  You don't break in front of a black man in a buffet line.
(to Lee)
Your friend have big appetite. (handing ROBES to Lee and Carter)
Please put these on and wait upstairs in the quiet room.

TWENTY MEN in SILK ROBES lie in reclining chairs, women massaging their feet and hands.  There are BIG SCREEN TV' showing nature films, relaxation music playing in the background.  Lee and Carter sit in the quiet room dressed in MATCHING PURPLE ROBES.  Lee wears SLIPPERS, Carter wears his HIGH TOPS.  Carter is enjoying a hand and neck massage at the time.  A WOMAN walks over and hands them each a drink.
Now I'm on vacation.  I knew you'd come through, Lee. LEE doesn't respond.  LEE IS STARING AT SOMEONE ON THE FA SIDE OF THE ROOM.  A man who radiates a unique blend of sophistication and brutality.
What's wrong?
Over there -- that's Ricky Tan.
That's Ricky Tan?  He's four feet tall.  I'll go over with you right now, shake him down.
This is a very dangerous man.
I'm a dangerous man.  You're not gonna ruin my massage because of some midget in a house coat.

I'm calling for back up! Lee gets up from a chair, hurriedly exits. Carter looks at RICKY TAN -- sitting quietly in his chair with his LAPTOP COMPUTER on his knees.  Carter makes a decision, gets up and walks towards him.
Ricky Tan, I've been looking all over for you.  Get up. Tan looks up for a moment, a smile.
I'm busy at the moment.
I said get on your feet!
I know you, Detective Carter, right?  You're Lee's American friend.  Enjoying your visit?

I'm Lee's new muscle, his right arm -- and don't let the robe fool you.  This is the only color they had left.  Now get up! Tan laughs, goes back to his laptop.  CARTER GRABS THE LA from Ricky and throws it across the room - SHATTERING IT against the wall.  Ricky glances at his men who are seate around the room waiting to move.
I told you to get on your feet! Having heard the commotion, Lee arrives by Carter's side, breathless, as Tan looks up, surprised.
Lee, I've missed you, brother. (getting up, giving Lee a hug)
I heard about the two Americans, I'm so sorry, you must be under great pressure.
You must come with me for questioning.
Let's go.  I've got girls and chicken and hot oil waiting for me.
I don't think so... A nod of Ricky Tan's head, and TEN LARGE MEN in robes and towels spring out of reclining chairs -- menacingly facin Lee and Carter.  A beat...
I'd like to pay you for that laptop.
It's no problem.  But I must excuse myself, inspector.
That's Chief Inspector, he got promoted. Tan bows to Lee and Carter.

Congratulations.  And good day. As Tan starts to exit, Lee and Carter move to intercept h But they are blocked by TAN'S MEN. Lee grabs one of the men's towels and pulls it off.  The covers his naked body.  Lee is grabbed by one of the othe henchmen, but he escapes and begins kicking ass, using th towel and his own robe to block and wrap another man's ar blocking, kicking, and punching everything in sight -- al the while managing to keep his privates covered with a to his robe, or some other found object. Carter, meanwhile, uses his quick hands to send several m flying back -- grabbing a towel of one of them.
(ref: his privates)

Damn!  No wonder you're pissed off. Carter uses the towel like Lee did to block and trap one the men's punches. In the middle of fighting, Lee is suddenly exposed -- he flinches to cover himself and is punched from behind.  Momentarily stunned, he's lifted from behind -- two men throwing him out the front door. Carter is also overpowered by two men, who lift him over their shoulders.
Ricky Tan's black limo SCREECHES to a stop.  The door fli open and Lee and Carter are TOSSED out onto the highway.  Both men are completely naked.
A packed street - Lee and Carter dodging in and out of people.  The CAMERA PANS and we see Lee and Carter from behind.
Goddamn you got a small ass.
Don't look at my ass!

The station is packed with Americans -- FBI AGENTS, SECRE SERVICE... they've set up shop right in the middle of the bullpen. SUPERINDENDENT CHIN is arguing with SPECIAL AGENT STERLIN 50-year old hard ass who is in charge of this circus.

Chin, you have been ordered by the Ministry of Public Security to assist the FBI and Secret Service with our investigation, to provide us with whatever we need.  If you have information, it belongs to us.
This is still Hong Kong.
Two Americans have been killed on United States Government property -- this is our investigation.
Chief Inspector Lee will brief your people...

No.  He will report to me.  Do we understand each other? SUDDENLY ALL EYES turn as Carter and Lee enter the bullpe Out of breath, still robed: Lee covering himself with a t can lid, Carter using a red construction cone.
Who the hell is that?
(humiliated)
That is...Chief Inspector Lee.  The detective in charge of our investigation.
Put a diaper on him, Chin.  I want to talk to the great Inspector Lee.
The shades are down as Lee frantically gets dressed, putt on a suit and fixing his tie.  Carter finishes putting on a BLACK CHINESE STYLE SUIT fro Lee's closet, then moves for the door.
Where are you going?
Back to Heaven on Earth.  I need my damn passport back.  I'm going home.
Fine.  Go home.  Who needs you.
Why you mad at me?  You needed back-up, so I backed you up.  I was about to take out Ricky Tan and those bodyguards.
Stop!  I'm sick of your bullshit!
My bullshit?  I'm not the one who goes to a karaoke bar filled with gangsters!  I'm not the one who goes to massage parlors to bust crime lords!
It's my job!
You're pathetic, man.  When's the last time you had some fun?  When's the last time you took a night off, had a date?
I have plenty of dates.
Really?  When's the last time you had some Mu-shu  Let's hear it, Lee, when was it?  Year of the rat?
You would never understand my life.  You're not Chinese.
And you ain't black! The two men look at each other for a long BEAT.  Lee quic walks out, slamming the door behind him, leaving Carter h dressed.
Lee walks in, sees Sterling sitting at Chin's desk.  Chin stands in the back.
Lee, this is Special Agent Sterling from the United States Secret Service.
The Secret Service?  Why?

What I'm about to tell you cannot leave this room.  The men who were killed yesterday were not American translators.  They were undercover U.S. customs agents trying to break a Triad smuggling ring.  We don't know what they're transporting out of Hong Kong, but whatever it is, it got the agents killed.
How can we help?
Stay the hell out of our way.
I can get to Ricky Tan.
We know all about Tan.  That's why we're leaving him out there as bait.  We think this is a lot bigger than just Ricky Tan and his Fu-Cang-Long Triads.
Carter is on the phone, his feet on Lee's desk.  As he ta he opens a drawer, pulls out a wad of cash and pockets it
Captain, you're gonna have to speak up.  I'm on a car phone!
CAPTAIN DIEL sits behind his desk talking on the phone.
Is it true, Carter?  Are you in Hong Kong right now?
Hong Kong?  I'm not in Hong Kong.  I'm in Hollywood -- right at Sunset and Vine, two minutes from the station.  How about I pick you up right now and take you to dinner?
It's nine-thirty in the morning.
Did I say dinner?  I meant diner.  Biscuits and gravy, you love that shit.
Do you know what happened yesterday, Carter?  I was officially nominated for the Commissioner's post for the LAPD.  There was a dinner last night, two hundred LAPD officers were there.
Two hundred cops?  Was Mario Sanchez there?  He owes me money.
I've waited my whole life for this job, but I don't have a shot in hell of getting it.  Do you know why?
Is it because of the hookers, sir?  You tell them there's no crime in being lonely.

No, Carter.  The reason I'm screwed is because the entire department is about to find out the stolen credit cards we impounded were used to buy two first class upgrades to Hong Kong.  And what the hell is Heaven on Earth?

Sir, I'm working on a big case over here -- and by the time I get back they're gonna make you Governor.  Captain, you there?  Hello?  Shit! As Carter walks out the DOOR, he brushes past HU LI, who standing in the hallway disguised as a FED EX DELIVERY PERSON.  Carter checks her out as he exits.
CARTER starts walking down the street, making his way pas outdoor BUTCHER MARKET, getting strange looks from locals tourists alike.  He motions to an OLD WOMAN who is sellin
How you doing?  Can you direct me to the Heaven on Earth massage parlor?   The OLD WOMAN stares at Carter, starts motioning to her C filled with birds.
No, I don't eat live birds.  I like my birds dead and deep fried.  You ever been to Popeyes? The Woman takes out a bird, holds up a HATCHET.
No, don't do that, I had a big lunch.  I'm warning you, I'm a police officer -- just put the blade down and let the bird go.

Lee walks out of the Captain's office, heads for his own office - but never gets there. AN EXPLOSION rips through the second floor of the station Lee diving for safety as glass and debris shoot over his head.  Sheer pandemonium as Lee quickly looks up at his destroyed office, tries to get to his feet. STUNNED POLICE OFFICERS and DETECTIVES are crowded around Lee's office, looking at the rubble.  Lee pushes through crowd -- it's all smoke and fire.  Now way anyone held ba by the heat.
Carter!  CARTER!
Carter walks down the street holding a CAGE WITH A LIVE R BIRD inside.  He stops a MAN who is sweeping in front of store.
How you doing?  I'm looking for Heaven on Earth. The man stares at Carter, watches as he pulls out his:
Shan-shui cao guo-jiu, pao gai niu tao zi.
You wish to spank my sister with a ping pong paddle?
No man, I was just asking...
Wait here.  I'll go see if she's awake. As the man walks into his store, Carter runs off. Pause. Carter strolls back INTO FRAME, peering into the store to if it's worth staying...
Lee sits by himself in shock.  Superindendent Chin approaches.
All he wanted was some mu-shu.
Are you okay, Lee? Beat.
I'm sorry, I have to go.

Carter finally makes his way to the massage parlor, movin for the FRONT DOOR when he sees RICKY TAN EXIT.  Carter d to the side and watches as Ricky climbs into the back of waiting Daimler. The Daimler drives off.  Carter rushes to the middle of t street with a determined look on his face.
I'm gonna solve this case myself.  Taxi! Carter flags down a CAB, jumps in the back seat.
The CAB DRIVER turns to Carter, who motions to the limo.
(loud)
Follow that limo. The Cab Driver continues to stare at Carter.
You understand what I'm saying?  Follow that car!  Where it goes, you go!  This is a chase -- we are chasing that limo! (beat)

We are still parked -- we're not moving!  This is the opposite of chasing -- drive the car or I will kill you! The driver slowly turns, holding out his hand.  Carter fi in his pocket hands the cab driver a wad of cash.
Now you speak my language.
Lee drives, misty-eyed.  RAP MUSIC playing over the stere Lee turns it up, slowly moving his head to the music, in tribute to Carter. His CELL PHONE rings, he turns down the music.
Lee, we just got a call from the harbor patrol.  Ricky Tan is throwing a little party on his boat tonight.  Victoria harbor.  If you don't want to...
Did you tell Sterling?
Let him find out on his own.  I want the Hong Kong police handling this.
Thank you. Lee hangs up.  A look of intensity.  He CRANKS the RAP MU up, a man on a mission.
A 190-FOOT YACHT is anchored in Victoria Harbor.  Ricky T walks along the top deck with HU LI, disappearing into a crowd of people who are partying on the ship. Carter steps out of the cab.
Stay here.  I'll be right back.  You understand?

Yes.  I understand. Carter steps out of the cab, which immediately drives off leaving him alone on the docks. Carter looks around the dock -- a pull up valet station parking fancy cars, RICH PEOPLE getting on the boat as th names are checked off a list by two DOORMEN.

A huge PARTY, a live band plays for a crowd of business m politicians and beautiful women - a who's who of Hong Kon CARTER walks up to the front of the boat -- TWO DOORMEN HOLDING clipboards immediately stop him.
Invitation, please.
I'm with the band.  I'm the lead singer.
The band has been playing over an hour.
I got held up at a wedding in Tai Koo.  Ricky here yet, I need to get his requests. As Carter walks past the doorman --
Wait.
Last party all he wanted was Sting -- not one person danced.  Tonight I'm doing Superfreak, I don't care what he says.  Where is he?
Mr. Tan is not to be disturbed by the help. Carter turns back to the doorman, grabs him by the collar
Help?  I'm not the help, man -- I'm the star.  That's my band up there -- I control the mood, the groove, the atmosphere. Carter cuts a smoking DANCE MOVE.
Can you do that? (man shakes head "no")
That's why you're down here and I'm up there.  Now this is my party -- don't forget it! Carter walks onto the ship, starts singing to himself.

The SHIP'S HORN SOUNDS, the yacht starts to head out to s Lee steps out of his car, sees the yacht is pulling out o the slip.  He runs along the side of the boat, has no cho but to jump from the end of the pier, landing hard on the side of the ship, somehow holding onto a PORTHOLE WINDOW. clings to the yacht, then throws himself toward a hanging LIFEBOAT, climbs up the side and jumps toward the TOP RAI

As Carter walks through the ship, he grabs a handful of f from a waiter, his eyes searching the crowd, rounds a cor - almost stepping right into HU LI, who's approaching STE REIGN.  Steven Reign is in his 50's -- perfectly groomed, impeccably dressed - his looks and bearing say one thing money. It doesn't matter. Lee thinks about this for a BEAT.
I'm not used to having a partner.
We are not partners.  Between your daddy, my daddy, and the beating I just took, as far as I can tell all partners get you is dead.
Well we're not friends.
You got that right.  And we ain't brothers.  Maybe we should just end this right here.
Fine with me.
I won't talk to you, you don't talk to me.  We'll die in peace.
See you in the next world.
I don't believe in reincarnation.  So I won't see you in the next world.
Fine.
I believe in heaven.  You people believe in heaven?
Yes.  We have heaven.
Is it the same heaven, or is it a Chinese heaven?
What's a Chinese heaven?
I thought it might be like those five foot and under basketball leagues.  They don't let everybody in.
I think we should stop talking.
Fine by me.
You thinking about that girl that dumped you?
No.
If she was the right girl, you'd be thinking about her.
Mind your own business.
How was the sex?
There was no sex.  She was very traditional.  We were waiting until we were married.
You're kidding.  No sex?  Nothing?  No mu-shu?
No mu-shu.
What about a little king pao chicken?
No kung pao chicken.  Never.
Steamed dumplings?
Once in a while, steamed dumplings.  But only when she was drunk.
That's rough, man.  If I don't get steamed dumplings once a week, I go crazy.
Tell me the truth, Carter.  Do you think I have a good voice?
Are you serious?
Forget it.  It doesn't matter. Lee turns away from Carter.
As long as you're asking...I think you have a pretty good voice.
I knew it.  What does she know.  You want me to sing something?
That depends.  How do the Fu-Cang-Long usually kill their victims?
They'll probably torture us first, shock our privates, then put two bullets in our eyes and one in the back of the head.
Go ahead.  Sing your ass off. Lee clears his voice.
Did you happen to see the most beautiful girl in the world...and if you did, was she crying, crying...hey!
The 18-WHEELER drives by followed by the LIMO.
Hu Li and Isabella sit in the back of one of the limos th is driving behind the truck.  Hu Li is on the car phone.
Don't worry, the plates are safe.  Yes, the dragon's been fed. She HANGS UP and glances at Isabella, who is doing her be to appear completely uninterested.
The LIMO splits off from the 18-WHEELER.

Carter works at opening one of the crates.  Lee steps up, takes a deep breath, searches the crate looking for the s spot, and PUNCHES a hole in one of the thick boards.  The start prying the crate open.
Very nice.
It's focus.  Every opponent has a weak spot.  You ignore everything around you, and put all your energy into one perfect strike.
I'll remember that next time I'm fighting a box. Carter opens the crate -- it's filled with SUPERBILLS, ab $1,000,000 worth.  He tosses a stack to Lee.
Hello, Benjamin.
Who's Benjamin?
Benjamin Franklin, he discovered electricity.
A Chinese man discovered electricity.
No Chinese man discovered electricity.
Yes he did.  He also invented the bicycle.
Now that I believe. Carter pockets two stacks of superbills.  Lee looks at hi
You never know.  Besides, I always wanted to die rich. The truck lurches.
We're slowing down.  This must be it.
End of the line.
You've been a good friend, James Carter.
Oh no you don't.  Don't you be getting corny on me, Lee.  I'll kick your ass from here to Compton.
You could never kick my ass.  You mama's boy.
Don't you talk about my mama. (winks at Lee)
That's more like it.

The truck is parked in the underground loading docks.  It approached by FOUR TRIAD SOLDIERS.  Soldier #1 opens the TRUCK'S DOUBLE DOORS to find. Lee and Carter are gone.  Except for boxes of money, the truck bed is EMPTY. Two soldiers enter the truck bed.
Lee and Carter WEDGED up against the CEILING of the truck bed.  Above the doors and over the soldiers. Lee and Carter SWING DOWN in unison -- knocking both sold to the ground.  In the next instant:
still holding on to the door frame -- swings and backflip onto the roof of the truck.

who swings onto the ground -- grabbing one of the guards use a shield as gunfire erupts. Lee jumps off the truck, knocking the last guard to the ground.  He then grabs the guard Carter is using as a shi and together THEY SWING him into the truck -- KNOCKING DO the first two guards. Carter and Lee slam the back doors SHUT -- bolting them CLOSED and run like hell - scrambling into what looks lik the closest way out: A LARGE OPEN PIPE on the side of the tunnel.
Lee and Carter run through - it extends out from the underground loading docks.
This way.  I see some lights. Lee and Carter spot a tiny sliver of light coming through MANHOLE COVER.  They start climbing up the metal stairs t lead up to the street.
The blvd.'s packed with PEOPLE and CARS.
Lee and Carter coming up from the manhole -- standing together in stunned disbelief as they look out at the LAS VEGAS STRIP.  They cover their eyes, blinded by the great light show in the world.
Vegas...

Lee.  I just got an idea how someone could launder a hundred million dollars in cash. They both turn around and come FACE TO FACE WITH: A TEN-STORY DRAGON.  Fire shoots from its nostrils every SECONDS. EXT. RED DRAGON HOTEL AND CASINO - NIGHT
FIRE BALLS BLOW out over the strip as Lee and Carter look at the RED DRAGON.  The HUGE NEON SIGN READS: GRAND OPENI
Lee and Carter come out of the sewer.
Red Dragon.
That was the name of Ricky Tan's boat. Lee and Carter watch as limos pull up to the front of the hotel -- it's like a HOLLYWOOD PREMIERE.  The richest of rich are making their way inside.
Let's go.
Wait a second.  We can't go in like this.  Look at this place, we gotta look fly.  We gotta Mac out.
What is Mac out?
Follow me my Asian brother. Carter and Lee start to walk away.
Just stay down wind, because I think you stepped in some serious rat shit down there.
Lee and Carter are walking into the upscale clothing stor
As they enter, a SALESMAN approaches them.
May I help you gentlemen? Carter flashes his biggest smile as he pulls out a stack superbills.
Black.  42-long.  Nothing touches this body but pure silk.  And get my partner something from the children's department. Carter puts his hand on Lee's shoulder.
Would your partner like silk as well?  I personally like it when a couple matches. Carter takes his hand off Lee's shoulder.
Couple?  No, you got it wrong, there's no couple here.  Just two single police officers working a very dangerous case.
Yes.  We have lots of big men chasing us.
I'm sure all the boys are chasing you two.  Don't worry, I'll make you guys the bell of the ball. He WINKS as he walks off, and Carter looks at Lee.
This is the last time I go shopping with you.
Lee and Carter enter frame, dressed to kill - perfectly tailored couture Versace suits, gold watches, the whole b Le is awkward in "player" guise.
(whispering)
Remember, Lee, you're a player now.  You own the place. Carter pulls out his ALTOIDS, and he and Lee each take on they walk through the doors.
I own the place.
Carter STRUTS through the lobby, Lee doing his best to imitate Carter's pimp and roll.  THEY WALK PAST THE GIANT
That looks exactly like my Uncle Darrell.
Buddha is the symbol of luck and good fortune.

Buddha is the symbol for fat and lazy.  The man has the biggest tits in Asia. They are moving through the MAIN ENTRY HALL lined with TE COTTA CHINESE SOLDIERS - posed and dressed for battle. RICKSHAWS and BICYCLES take people through the hotel.  Th MAIN CASINO is roped off and empty.  People crowded aroun the perimeter - a sign reads:
$50,000 buy in -- EVERYBODY'S A WINNER! The LIGHTS DIM - a spotlight comes on and finds STEVEN RE on the balcony overlooking the ENTRANCE.

A thousand years ago, a small, wealthy village in China hired a young Dragon to guard their treasure in a cave, hoping to scare off potential bandits.  Their plan worked quite well, until the people of the village started sneaking the Dragon extra food -- hoping to make him bigger and stronger.  The Dragon ate so much and grew so big -- that he eventually got stuck inside the cave -- and the treasure was stuck behind him for all eternity. (beat)

Ladies and gentlemen, I have found that lost treasure.  It is here, inside the greatest casino in the world!  Welcome to the Red Dragon, where everybody is a winner! Reign smiles, flips a switch -- the CASINO COMES TO LIFE. Fireworks, bright lights, endless rows of tables, dealers waiting. A BAND PLAYS on a stage in the casino lounge. Chinese ACROBATS perform suspended from the ceiling and o the balconies above. Applause all around as the FLAME shoots out of the dragon nostrils and the acrobats perform.  Carter and Lee walk d the red carpet.
(to waitress)
Bring us some twelve-year old scotch... (to a cigarette girl)
Get us a box of your finest cigars. (to a change girl)
Give me ten dollars in nickels.
Dice ROLLING on a craps table.

Winner!  Seven! We see BLACKJACK DEALERS BUSTING - paying out CUSTOMERS. Hundred dollar slot machines paying out jackpots. GAMBLERS winning all over the casino.  Then going to the cage and exchanging their chips for SUPERBILLS.
Look at this place, Lee.  The biggest front in the world. As people pour into the casino, Steven Reign is making hi way through the crowd, shaking hands and posing for pictu
Carter...here comes the rich white man.
Wait here.  I'll handle this. As Carter walks off, a WOMAN grabs Lee and pulls him onto dance floor.
The woman spins to face Lee, her face half-hidden under t dance floor lights.
Put your arms around me.
Excuse me? Isabella grabs him around the waist, pulls him close.

Hold me close.  There's cameras everywhere. An ASIAN BAND sings STRANGERS IN THE NIGHT as Lee tries h best to slow dance.  An intimate moment between Isabella Lee, her face nestled in the crook of his neck, hiding he face.
What's going on?
I need your help.
Last time you needed my help I ended up in the back of a truck.
I'm undercover.  I had no choice.  You have to trust me. Lee starts to get into the music, moving his hips in a sl sensual rhythm.
You move well.
Just trying to make it look real.
Look over there.  That's the eye in the sky room. Lee looks over her shoulder.
Behind me is the soft count room.  We're pretty sure the plates are back there.
Why don't you go get them?
If I'm wrong then my cover is blown.
As Steven Reign makes his way through the casino, Carter steps right in front of him, giving him a big hug.
Stevie, how's it going my man?  Somebody get a picture, we can use it for a mug shot.
Detective Carter, you always seem to show up where you don't belong.
Lemme ask you something, Steven.  And I want the truth.  Is there any way I can date your daughter?  Just dinner and a movie, maybe go listen to some jazz...
Vegas has been my town for 30 years.  I crawled out from under the first rock.  Do you really think you can intimidate me here?
You're right, you're a smart guy.  Most counterfeiters only get ten cents on the dollar.  But this is an even swap.  Pure genius.
You play games with me, Detective, and you'll lose every time.  Don't forget.  The odds are always in favor of the house. Reign walks off with his men.  Carter watches him leave.
Lee is dancing close with Isabella.
The Secret Service almost busted Reign at his casino in Macao, but the place burned down before we could move in.
How do I know I can trust you?
Dip me! Lee dips her, holds her in his arms for a long BEAT.
I'm asking for real now -- will you help the Secret Service?
No. (beat)
But I'll help you. Lee holds her for a long BEAT, their lips almost touching He finally lets her go, and she disappears into the crowd Carter walks up, sees Lee standing alone on the dance flo
Lee, what the hell are you doing?
Dancing?
Dancing?  I'm out here trying to strong arm Steven Reign, putting my life on the line, and you're up here dancing with some bimbo.  Did she have a friend?
It was Isabella.  She says the plates are in the soft count room. Lee motions to the room, where WE SEE a SECURITY GUARD standing in front of a small door.
Isabella?  Are you crazy, man?  She almost got us killed.  She's setting you up again!
No.  I'm going to find out.
Wait a second.  There's guards all over the place.  You'll need a distraction. Carter looks around the casino.
I'll go to the craps table, make a big scene.  When security comes over, you make your move.
Try to keep them busy for five minutes.
I'll give it my best shot. INT. CASINO - CONTINUOUS
Carter walks up to a CRAPS TABLE, everyone turning to sta
Sir, you're aware that we require a fifty-thousand dollar buy in to gamble here this weekend? Carter throws a HUNDRED THOUSAND in $100 BILLS onto the table.

I saw the sign, I can read.  Now gimme a hundred-thousand in chips.  And a Diet Coke and some wash-n-dries.  Let's move, people, I came to play. The DEALER pushes 100K worth of CHIPS in front of Carter.
What the hell is that?
Those are five hundred dollar chips.
Did you give me five-hundred dollar chips because I'm black?
No, I just assumed...
You assumed a brother coming in here can only afford five-hundred dollars a roll, is that right?  Are you a racist?
No, sir.
(starting to scream)

Everyone else at the table has thousand dollar chips, but the black man gets the nickel, is that it?  Did my people survive two-hundred years of slavery so you could send us back to the cotton fields with five-hundred dollar chips?  Do I look like Chicken George to you? The PIT BOSS gets on his walkie-talkie.
Floor security, we have a problem at table nine.
The SECURITY GUARD lowers his walkie-talkie, starts movin towards Carter's table.
TWO SECURITY GUARDS approach Carter's table.
Answer me one question.  How come Ben Vereen isn't performing here at the hotel?  Is Ben Vereen not good enough for you people?
Lionel Ritchie is performing here tonight.
Lionel Ritchie hasn't been black since the Commodores.
Sir, you're going to have to calm down. Carter watches as Lee moves past the guard and makes his into the soft count room.

I have a dream, where black people and white people can gamble together without getting different chips! A BIG CROWD has gathered as the Security Guards try and p their way through.  The pit boss picks up the phone, call upstairs.
Sing with me!  "We shall overcome!" Carter starts clapping, and the confused crowd joins in a the Security Guards move in.
Thank you.  Now in the spirit of brotherhood, let's play craps!

Lee walks into the hallway, moving like a cat as he hugs walls and tries to make his way to the soft count room. He hears noise, TWO SECURITY GUARDS coming behind him thr the casino door.  He has no choice but to crawl over the of a money cart and hug the top.  He lies as still as he trying not to be seen -- until he realizes he's staring directly into the EYE IN THE SKY cameras that are in the ceiling.

as he passes directly under the camera, clearly mouthing words "oh shit" as he rolls by. Lee looks to his left, sees the SOFT COUNT ROOM -- a moun of COUNTERFEIT SUPERBILLS that are waiting to be paid out On the opposite side, the REAL MONEY is being WHEELED OUT toward a waiting TRUCK that is parked at the back door. Lee sees two more cameras in the ceiling, knows his cover blown.  He jumps down off the cart, is standing in front the locked vault.  There's no way to get the plates.  Isabella has set him up again. He turns and smiles at the confused SECURITY GUARDS.

Hi.  How's it going?  You guys have change for a twenty? The GUARDS make their move.  And Lee starts to fight them down the hall, using the cart as a shield as he RAMS into MORE GUARDS, fights them off as he turns the corner towar the casino door -- but he gets slammed to the ground by a right cross. Hu Li threw the punch, a roll of quarters in her hand as stands over him with FIVE TRIAD SOLDIERS.  She holds a kn to Lee's throat.
(in Chinese)
Open your mouth. She puts the small grenade in Lee's mouth, tapes it shut. She holds the detonator in her hand.
(continuing in Chinese)
That's a ying-tao grenade, Inspector.  Please follow me or I'll blow 32 teeth into your brain.
A crowd has gathered behind Carter who is at the table rolling dice, a huge stack of chips in front of him.
Winner six!
How much is that?
Two-hundred thousand!
Two-hundred thousand dollars?  Who wants a hundred dollars? Carter turns to the MAN next to him, who wears a traditio AFRICAN ROBE and is standing with a giant blonde escort.
Here, your highness, have a hundred dollars.  The Viagra is on me tonight!
(South African accent)
I am not royalty, sir.
Don't say that, we're all royalty.  My great grandmammy was Queen Nephertit -- we probably cousins, man.  How much you got on the table?
One million.
Yeah, we definitely cousins now.  Who wants to blow on my hand for luck? Carter turns to a BIG TEXAN who is standing with a GORGEO YOUNG GIRL who is falling out of her dress.
Hey, Marlboro man, you mind if your lady blows on my hand for luck?
(embarrassed)
She's not my lady.  She's my niece.
Can I come over for Thanksgiving?  Come on, baby, give me some luck. The GIRL blows on the dice, and Carter stares down at her
Nice blowing.  When's your next birthday, I'll be the cake.
Hey, buddy, watch yourself.
Don't threaten me.  I got friends in this town that will bite off your ears.  Just sit tight, because I've got the dice and I am on fire! Carter throws the dice.
Winner, seven! The table erupts as Carter grabs the dice.
Let it ride! INT. UPSTAIRS HALLWAY - NIGHT
The elevator doors OPEN and Lee is led toward the eye in sky room by Hu Li and the three Triads.  As they walk int the room, the Triads remain outside guarding the room.

FORTY VIDEO MONITORS show every inch of the hotel.  A MAN stands in front of the two-way mirror looking down at the casino, the reflection off the glass obscuring his featur Lee has the tape around his mouth and his hands tied behi his back as he's led into the room by Hu Li.

Imagine a business where people hand you money.  And you hand them back absolutely nothing. Ricky Tan - alive and well, turns around and stares at Le Isabella is standing next to him.  Lee is shocked at the sight of Ricky Tan alive.
Now that's a true American dream.  Thanks to a few pieces of metal and a very greed driven US Customs agent. Ricky Tan walks toward Lee, starts to smile.
Look at you, you're ridiculous.  You know it didn't have to be like this.  But it's too bad!  Like father, like son. Lee stares at Isabella for a BEAT.  Hu Li motions to one the monitors.
(in Chinese)
He's going for the plates. Ricky Tan looks at one of the MONITORS, sees Steven Reign walking down a hallway, about to walk into the PENTHOUSE SUITE.
Look at this old fool, what does he think he's doing? Ricky Tan shifts his attention back to Lee.
It's almost impossible to find a partner that's trustworthy and loyal.  Wouldn't you agree, Lee?
We see Carter at the craps table having the time of his l Ricky Tan turns to walk out of the room, motioning to Isabella as he goes.
Well, at least you will die with honor.  But choy Gien. SUBTITLES: "Won't see you again."
Carter has two racks of chips in front of him, a huge cro surrounding him.
Winner!  Four, winner!
I'm up a hundred and fifty-grand.  That's a Ferrari.  Do they sell those here in the gift shop?  Somebody cash me out! Several TRIAD SOLDIERS dressed like SECURITY GUARDS appro Carter's table.
Sir, we'd like to escort you to the cashier.
That would be great.  Don't want any of these rich white people to jump me. As they walk toward the door marked "VIP ROOM", Carter glances at the MEN, knows he's in deep shit.
Ricky Tan turns to Hu Li.
Chai Hu Li. ("Little Fox")
Have fun. Ricky Tan walks out.  Hu Li holds the detonator up to Lee plays with the button.
(in Chinese)

In a few minutes...you'll beg me to push this button. Hu Li pulls her KNIFE, moves towards Lee.  She holds the blade to his face.  About to cut him.  When Isabella pull her gun. Isabella walks toward Lee, whose hands are still tied beh his back.  Hu Li clutches the detonator in one hand, her knife in the other.  She takes a step toward Isabella.
It's time to end this, Inspector. Isabella cocks the gun, spins back and kicks the detonato from Hu Li's hand -- slamming her against the wall and sticking the gun under her chin.

Don't move!  United States Secret Service. Hu Li WHIPS her KNIFE around, catches Isabella across the hand -- the GUN SLIDING across the room near the detonato the TWO WOMEN fight around it. Lee watches them almost step on it - dives to the floor a rolls toward the detonator.  He's about to grab it when:
They're about to move in.

Get the detonator! The Triads go for the detonator -- as Lee gets to his fee KICKS Hu Li's legs out from under her. One of the Triads about to pick up the detonator - but Le gets to him first.  He fights with one hand tied behind h back. Hu Li and Isabella fight it out in the EYE IN THE SKY ROO Lee gets kicked towards the Eye In The Sky WINDOW.
Two security guards lead Carter away from the table when:
An AIRBORNE Lee rockets through the EYE IN THE SKY WINDOW In a rain of glass, he lands HARD on the casino floor. The NOISE grabs everyone's attention, including:
Lee!! The guards restrain him.
Lemme ask you something.  Any of you ever felt $500,000 before? He SLAMS THE RACK OF CHIPS ACROSS THEIR FACES -- chips fl as the GUARDS hit the floor.
Doesn't feel so good, does it?
Hu Li picks up the detonator.  WHACK!  A heeled foot kick from her grasp.  Isabella has recovered!  The detonator F OUT THE BROKEN WINDOW.

On his back, Lee watches the detonator SAIL OVER HIS HEAD DISAPPEAR into the crowd.  It lands on a DRINK CART.  Bef Lee can get there, a WAITRESS changes trays and carries t detonator on her rounds. Panicked, Lee searches for the detonator.  He JUMPS atop BLACKJACK TABLE to get a better vantage.  He can't see it but he does see:
Carter on top of a CRAPS TABLE, keeping security guards a bay with a croupier stick.
Black man gets on a hot streak and you're all trippin'? Carter and Lee see each other.  They have the same simultaneous though:
(help!)
Lee!
(help!)

Carter is Lee's only hope to get the bomb out of his mout But from here to there, a MASS OF PEOPLE.  The quickest w is the HIGH WAY. Lee leaps from TABLE to TABLE.  Scattering playing cards. Reaching the carpeted divide...Lee doesn't stop.  He launches off the bent-over back of a high roller -- landing on a RICKSHAW, SURFING IT to the tables on the ot side. Carter looks around for Lee, catches a glimpse of the Eye the Sky Room.  He grins.
Check it out.  Catfight! POW!  He socks a GUARD in the face.
Isabella and Hu Li are locked in battle.  Rolling to the floor, they both see the gun.  They scramble over each ot to get to it first.
A security guard CLIMBS on the table to level Carter when arrives.  He kicks the guard off and turns to Carter, his plea MUFFLED.

What the HELL are you doing with tape on your face? No time to explain -- two more security guards arrive.  K and punches fly, but Lee CAN'T GET HIT IN THE MOUTH!  He and weaves, holding his hands to Carter to untie them in between swings.  Suddenly: BLAM!  BLAM!  BLAM!  GUNSHOTS from the Eye In The Sky Roo Everyone HITS THE DECK.  Carter and Lee dive on to the fl as panic ripples through the Casino.  People FLEE for the EXITS. THE WAITRESS DESERTS HER TRAY.  It gets knocked over and on the floor.  The DETONATOR LANDS feet away from Carter.

This can't be good. Lee's eyes BUG - he sees it too, feet STAMPEDING past it! high heel misses it by a fraction of an inch.  He LUNGES it, manages to CRADLE it in his taped hands when -- WHAM!  He is BUMPED and it FLIES AWAY.  The second it hit the floor, it is KICKED, skittering down the red carpet. ABOVE...the victor emerges in the Eye in the Sky Room.  H STEPS OUT on the PAGODA ROOF and JUMPS DOWN.   The DETONATOR ROLLS right past Hu Li.  As she bends to PI up the detonator, Lee knows he won't get there in time.  Horrified, he SCREAMS at CARTER through the tape. Hu Li lifts the detonator. Carter finally pulls the TAPE OFF Lee's face. Lee SPITS the grenade into the air.
(diving on Carter)
Bomb!!! Hu Li HITS the TRIGGER just as it lands on a roulette tab
The table is BLOWN OFF IT'S FOUNDATION.  Chips and cash volcano.  Hu Li is blown backwards by the force of the bl SHEER PANDEMONIUM grips the casino.
Carter and Lee peer out from behind a row of slot machine The place is deserted.
Why didn't you tell me you had a bomb in your mouth?
I did!
No you didn't!
Yes I did.  I said MMMMMM! A hand on Carter's arm.  THIS IS SERIOUS.
Ricky Tan is alive.
What?!?!
We have to get to the Penthouse. Lee jumps up, SPRINTS toward the elevators at the dragon of the casino.

Hold on! Carter stuffs his pockets with chips, then races after Le But halfway up the carpet.  Carter stops.  Lee turns to s what is holding him up.   Hu Li SURVIVED the blast and Carter has turned to face he
You go after Ricky.  I got this.
Carter...
Just GO! Lee turns and runs off past the dragon.  Unfortunately, F TRIADS block his path.  In a flurry of PUNCHES, Lee makes short work of them, and races toward the elevators.

head_text.subj: DEAD CENTER ON THE RED CARPET

text: Each readying in their own manner.  Hu Li carefully wraps long hair into a bun on top of her head.  Carter stretche flexes, ready to sting like a bee.
I'm not gonna hold you back this time just because you're a woman.  I'm gonna pretend you're a man. She pulls off her jacket, prepares to fight him in her undershirt.
A very beautiful man with a perfect body who I'd like to take to the movies. She takes a sword from a Terra Cotta statue, SWINGS IT AR like a master.

I may have been absent the day we went over this in karate class. Quick, Carter reaches for a fighting stick off a Terra Co soldier.  WHOOSH!  She SLICES IT IN HALF.  Carter reaches another.  SLICE!  She's toying with him.
Lee's in the elevator as the doors close.  SUDDENLY, a HA cuts through, parting the doors. It's ISABELLA!  A wound on her shoulder.
Are you okay?
I'm fine. She steps in, too weak and starts to fall.  Lee grabs her holds her in his arms.  HE gently helps her down.
I didn't know which side you were on.
Now you know. DING!  The elevator doors open.  Isabella holds up a ROOM - the key to the SUITE.  Lee takes the key, backs away an steps into the elevator.
I'll try to get backup.  Be careful. The elevator doors close.

Steven Reign is closing the safe.  There are stacks of HUNDRED DOLLAR BILLS on his desk, which he's putting in a black bag along with the plates.  As he turns around, he comes face-to-face with Ricky Tan.
American's love to gamble.  Don't they, Mr. Reign?
I'm cutting our deal short.  I'm leaving.
And my plates?
They stay with me.  I'm sure you won't have a problem with that. Reign shows Tan the gun in his belt.  Grabs the bag and starts to walk toward the door.
I enjoyed that little story you told about the Dragon and the treasure.  My mother used to tell it to me all the time.  Do you know the moral of that story, Mr. Reign?
Greed will imprison us all. Tan grabs Reign from behind and stabs him with a knife.
I hate that fortune cookie shit. Lee BURSTS through the suite door - watches as Reign fall dead to the floor.  Ricky takes the black bag off the des
Put the plates down. Ricky Tan looks down at the gun in Reign's belt.
WHOOSH!  Another Terra Cotta fighting stick is in half in Carter's hands.
Will you STOP?!?! (picks up cocktail umbrella)

What am I supposed to fight you with? No more toying.  Hu Li CHARGES Carter, who GRABS a ROULET WHEEL as a MAKESHIFT SHIELD.  She SLICES it in HALF!  He' got nowhere to hide. She JABS him with the sword.  Carter SCREAMS.  Falls back against the table, clutching his chest.  Hu Li WINDMILLS, kicking a Terra Cotta soldier on top of Carter, but --

The DOUBLE-BLADED BAMBOO POLE in its hand ricochets back she is PIERCED THROUGH THE SHOULDER with the blade.  Star at Carter in stunned disbelief, she drops to her knees. Carter walks toward her, considers his options, then KICK HER IN THE HEAD, knocking her out.

When are you people gonna learn?  Don't mess with the brothas! WEAK in the KNEES, Carter looks to the SOUND ON HIS CHEST reaches through the slice in his jacket.  Instead of a ha covered in blood, it comes out with a THICK WAD OF CASH!
Thank you, Benjamin! Carter runs for the elevator.
Lee is walking toward Ricky Tan, the two men circling Rei body.

You're just like your father, Lee.  All these years hiding behind his badge.  I wanted to help him, to share with him, but he was too afraid of change.  When you think about it, I didn't really kill him.  I just put him out of his misery.
Put the plates down.  It's over.
I don't think it's over.  There are casinos all over this country.  Let me make you a rich man, Lee.  Don't make the same mistake he did. Ricky glances at the gun in Reign's belt.
If you reach for that gun, I'm going to kill you.
Don't you remember?  I'm already dead. Ricky makes a play for the gun, but Lee is much too fast, taking the gun and pushing Ricky against the wall just as Carter bursts in the room.
Hey, Ricky, how's it going man?  What's up, Lee? Lee has the gun pressed to Tan's head.  We've never seen like this before.
Would you like me to tell you how your father died?
Lee, you okay? Lee doesn't respond.  He keeps an eye on Ricky.

He never begged for his life.  Or tried to make a deal.  All that he asked me, just seconds before I pulled the trigger, was that I promise not to kill you. Lee's finger is on the trigger -- he wants to pull the trigger but can't.
Lee, wait a second.  It's not worth it, man.  He's making you do this.
It's worth it to me.
Do you have it in you, Lee?  Or are you gonna spend the rest of your life hiding like your father?
C'mon, Lee.  He's going to jail.  You won, now just put the gun down. Lee is trying to pull the trigger, but he can't.
That's what I thought. Tan takes the black bag and swings it toward Lee -- the plates hit him across the face and knock him down.

Tan reaches for it and is about to pull the trigger when: Lee and Carter come flying at him TOGETHER.  Both KICKING SQUARE IN THE CHEST. Tan falls back, SMASHING THROUGH THE WINDOW.  Lee tries t grab Tan's hand, their fingers touch for a split second. But Tan pulls his hand away and falls 20 STORIES to the street below.
A TAXI is parked out front.  Tan's BODY SLAMS on the roof

head_text.subj: SMASHING THROUGH A SIGN ON TOP THAT READS

text: Lee and Carter are looking down at the street, both relie it's finally over.  Carter puts his hand on Lee's shoulde

I don't know about you, but I need a wine cooler. As they turn to the door -- Hu Li is walking toward them, bleeding and half-dead.  She has ANOTHER BOMB IN HER HAND This one twice the size of the one from earlier.
(in Chinese)
We'll go together, Inspector.
Please tell me she just asked for a ride to the airport. Hu Li hits the switch - starts to smile.  Lee and Carter and RUN for the OPEN WINDOW.
Lee and Carter DIVE OUT THE WINDOW, grab a cable just as

The FIREBALL SHOOTS out as they start to slide down the s of the hotel. THEY SCREAM AS THE CABLE BREAKS. Lee and Carter SWING toward a HUGE "GRAND OPENING" BANNER They flip under it, do a loop before they SLAM AGAINST TH SIGN. It's KNOCKED LOOSE and they fall with it toward VEGAS BLV Lee and Carter hang on as they drop to the street.  A HUG TRUCK speeds toward them as they hold on for their lives. The entire STRIP SPEEDING toward them.
I can't believe I flew ten-thousand miles for this shit!! They lift their feet just as the TRUCK PASSES.  The sign and they fall straight down into the open sunroof of a LA STRETCH LIMO.
Lee and Carter land in the back.  Slam into their seats a try to catch their breath.  The TWO MEN STARTING TO LAUGH when they realize they're alive!
We made it, man.

No problem. Lee and Carter look up to see the VERSACE SALESMAN and FO OF HIS FRIENDS sitting in the back of the limo staring at them.  The BOYS are all drinking champagne and dressed fo night on the town.
Well, there is a God after all. Lee and Carter exchange looks as the limo stops in front the hotel.
Here we are.  The Red Dragon hotel. In front of the hotel WE SEE FIRE TRUCKS, AMBULANCE, POLI CARS and Isabella and Sterling arresting TWENTY TRIADS.
We're all going gambling and then to see Siegried and Roy.  I hope you two are feeling lucky!

Lee is talking with a bandaged Isabella, who is standing Sterling and several other SECRET SERVICE AGENTS.  Lee an Isabella hug goodbye.  As she walks off to board her plan Lee slowly walks back to Carter who is smiling.
I saw that.  She kissed you, didn't she?  You played it cool, though.  Walking away, never looking back.
She's going home to New York.  I need some ice. Lee and Carter watch as she gets on the plane.
That your gate down there?
Yes.
I'm this way.  I guess this is goodbye.
I guess so.  Thank you, Carter.
You take care of yourself, Lee. Carter steps back, BOWS TO LEE.  Lee SHAKES CARTER'S HAND like a brother.  The two men smile.  Turn to walk away.
Carter, wait.  There's something I want you to have. Lee pulls a BADGE from his pocket.  Hands it to Carter.
Your father's badge?  No way, man.  I can't take this.
It's okay.  I can finally let it go. Carter takes the badge.  Smiles.
In that case, I got something for you.  I picked it up at the hotel. Carter pulls out a WAD OF CASH.
What is this?
About fifty grand.  I won it at the tables.
No, Carter.  I can't take this.
It's okay, I got lots more. Carter pulls out another wad of cash.
They owe us, man.  That's the least they can do.
This money is evidence.
Come on, Lee.  Stop being a cop for five minutes and live it up.  There must be something you want. Lee looks back toward Isabella.
I always wanted to go to Madison Square Garden.  See the Knicks play.
New York City?
First class.
The Plaza Hotel?
A little Mu-shu.
Some Kung-Pao? They look at each other, smile.
I could use a little vacation.

Amen to that, brother. As Lee and Carter start to walk away together, the MUSIC SWELLS.  "WAR" starts to PLAY.  They dance their way thro a crowd of people, their arms raised as the two friends m their way through the airport. END CREDITS
